TopicTitle: Is the direct download link going to be updated?

Articles.Content:
Like a lot of people, I can\'t get the patcher to work. I\'ve tried it at least 8 times already. I know the patcher was meant to reduce bandwidth, but continually redownloading the patch can\'t be much better.

So will the store version of KSP be updated to .16 soon?
I would like to know the same, patcher doesn\'t work.
Maybe on monday because thats when the devs come back.
